attributes.action: Stop the term "superfast broadband" being used to describe slow broadband.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"Superfast broadband" should only be allowed to describe super fast broadband. i.e. Sweden's 1gbit lines are "superfast".  Their 100mbit download and upload lines for about £15 are "fast"
BT's plan of 60 down / 5? up isn't superfast.  It's not even really that fast. 
"Semidecent broadband" would be a much more honest term to use.
